title: Footy The La Perouse Way
creator_contributor_role: Dreaming Digital Pty Ltd, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Rugby football players - Biography
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Sydney (N.S.W.) - Social life and customs
abstract: Sydney's La Perouse had an all-black football team in the 1930s but by the 1950s all nationalities were being welcomed.
description: A documentary that uses historic photographs to talk about the history of rugby league in the Sydney suburb of La Perouse and how football has helped build a community that prides itself on being open to people of all cultures.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002763; Black Screen; Active; 2014
